root_cause: RAN congestion on cell-A01 (utilization 91%) causing latency spike (310ms) and packet loss (5.8%).
notes: Divert part of the load to neighbor cells. Auto-rollback if KPIs do not improve after 5 minutes.

root_cause: Transport/backhaul congestion affecting cell-B17, leading to high latency (270ms) and packet loss (4.9%).
notes: Reroute traffic through an alternative link. Rollback if no improvement is observed within 5 minutes.
